Package me.sciguymjm.uberenchant.api

Class UberEnchantment

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment
me.sciguymjm.uberenchant.api.UberEnchantment
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener, org.bukkit.Keyed
Direct Known Subclasses:
EffectEnchantment
public abstract class UberEnchantment extends org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
The UberEnchantment class to be extended for adding custom enchantments.
